name: The Potato Nightmare TD
description:
This game was made for the UE4 Megajam 2017.

For the potatoes!

Defend yourself against those who want to eat you. In the darkness you need to use potato powered beacons in order to see your enemies. Use everything at your disposal to prevent enemies reaching your gate.

- Tiles must be lit in order to attack units that walk over them.
- Farms and distillery is found if you move the camera down.
- Help is there on the middle-left part of the screen.

Controls

W/A/S/D - Move Camera
MMB - Rotate Tower
Del - Sell Tower
RMB - Cancels current action
